results.name: Partial sums of (-1)^floor(n*e).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Kevin O'Bryant, Bruce Reznick, and Monika Serbinowska, Almost alternating sums, Amer. Math. Monthly, Vol. 113 (October 2006), 673-688.
program: (PARI) vector(50, n, sum(j=1,n, (-1)^(j\exp(-1))) ) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 05 2019
(MAGMA) [&+[(-1)^Floor(j*Exp(1)): j in [1..n]]: n in [1..130]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 05 2019
(Sage) [sum((-1)^floor(j*exp(1)) for j in (1..n)) for n in (1..130)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 05 2019
xref: Cf. A123724 (sum for 2^(1/3)), A123737 (sum for sqrt(2)), A123738 (sum for pi).
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Oct 11 2006
